website_summaries.verdict: Thick and quality-made, these striped towels are simple and functional.
cons: They may shrink, although this tightens the weave

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Kitchen Towel
customer_reviews.text: I've looked all over for affordable kitchen towels that are both absorbent and durable. This is exactly what I've been looking for! I use them primarily for hand towels and occasionally for drying dishes or cleaning up a spill. They absorb so much they barely feel wet even after washing and drying my hands several times in a short amount of time. They are also larger than I envisioned, which I love. They don't fall off the stove handle where I drape them or get soaked as quickly as a result. I've also had no fraying, holes, or broken hems from washing. I recommend these towels to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Arcanixus

customer_reviews.title: Workhorse Towels, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: The are wonderful super absorbent towels. I bought this same brand maybe two years ago and after many many washes, they still look and work great. I use a little Oxy Clean for stubborn stains, but they held up well. I recently repainted and changed my color scheme so I wanted new colors. I was happy that they came in the colors I wanted. The oversized aspect makes them easy to use for many purposes. The older orange towels will stay in the lining closet for other household uses than the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: LadyO

customer_reviews.title: Same as expensive kitchen store brand
customer_reviews.text: These are identical to a high end home store brand (rhymes with Billiams Romona) classic stripe dish towels. These are priced better and arrived quickly with free shipping. They wash well (even with bleach). The weave tightens up with drying. They arrive tied up beautifully and would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: seriously it's just a nice sturdy kitchen towel
customer_reviews.text: If a ninja attacked me in the kitchen this is the towel I'd want to have handy. OK, seriously it's just a nice sturdy kitchen towel. Basically identical to the one that was top pick from America's Test Kitchen at half the price. It does what a towel is supposed to do and washes up well afterward.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Culliton

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Kitchen Towels
customer_reviews.text: I like these towels so much that I am purchasing another set-- they are my favorite because they are large, made of 100 percent cotton, hold up well to washing and drying, and are nice-looking. They do not leave much lint when used to dry dishes. My favorite feature of these towels is their extra-large size, even after they shrink in the wash. Be aware that they do shrink because they are made from cotton. They are medium-thick, which is perfect for most if my kitchen needs (drying dishes, using as a hot mitt, etc.)
customer_reviews.author: KitKat

customer_reviews.title: Big and Absorbant
customer_reviews.text: These are nice to have in the kitchen! They're really large for a dish towel, but it works to your advantage when drying things, because you can always find a spot that isn't too wet yet! Mine are on their third washing and seem to be holding up OK, although the somewhat loose weave means that they can get easily caught on things. Wish there were more color options.
customer_reviews.author: T. Vex

customer_reviews.title: Love this Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love these towels! They come beautifully presented in a lovely package with rope bow! Nice and big- I lay a few towels out sometimes to set my drying pots and pans on- these are the best size! I will buy a few extra of these for wedding showers.
customer_reviews.author: E. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: These a less expensive than others I purchased at the same time, but are much better than the more costly ones. The weave is looser than the expensive "spread," but they seem to get the job done better. Also, after washing, these do not curl up at the edges like the more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: Geo Oahu

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Of course, they’re not quite as nice as the William Sonoma towels in the coloring of the stripes, but what can you expect for such a great price? Since the boys tend to stain towels (how do they do that?) I thought I’d try these. I’m happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Favorite kitchen towels
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 3 packs of these in the past few years. They are hands down my favorite kitchen towels. Wish they still came in black!
customer_reviews.author: NebraskaBurger

customer_reviews.title: Love these towels
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order of these great towels. Excellent quality and long lasting, they need to be washed a couple of times to really soften. Now they are super absorbent and wash and dry perfectly, they do not twist out of shape and wear like iron!
customer_reviews.author: Careful Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Thick, big - the perfect towel
customer_reviews.text: These towels have some meat to them. They're big and thick, perfect for use in my kitchen. Pretty, too. I won't let my son or hubby use them when they eat ribs and other things that might stain them because I like them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Trey

customer_reviews.title: Great towels!
customer_reviews.text: Great large dish towels. Every bit as good as the prior reviews say. Was considering WS brand, but thought I’d give these a try since they were significantly less $$. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: suzanneden

customer_reviews.title: Great Color & Design
customer_reviews.text: Great quality dish towels. Love the red, the design & think they'd do a great job. However too big for me. Will have to return them but will see if they make a smaller towel to buy.
customer_reviews.author: DebSue

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: If you enjoy moving water around a plate this is for you. Already looking for other uses for them
customer_reviews.author: retired

customer_reviews.title: solid construction
customer_reviews.text: Heavy fabric, tight weave. It shrinks about two inches but it starts out big enough. Feels like a laster.
customer_reviews.author: Steven H Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Happy Guilt Trip!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: big size, helpful loops, well made. Ridding old towels. Raised not to waste money. Glad I splurged on these!
customer_reviews.author: Honest shopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love these towels. Over the time I have purchased several sets.
customer_reviews.author: GoldFish

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Large size, absorbent and good looking! No lint.Great price, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Procrastinator

customer_reviews.title: Good size, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I really like these kitchen towels! If it had a thread count, it would be high. Each towel is made of sturdy cotton. I hang one on my oven door to dry my hands and hardly ever use paper towels for drying anymore. They're perfect for drying dishes.
customer_reviews.author: SaturdayinthePark

customer_reviews.title: Strength. Durability. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Strong towel. Durable. Like the larger cloth hook. Good value. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality re: color, weight and absorbency before and AFTER 1st laundering.
customer_reviews.author: ang alexander

customer_reviews.title: Looks Faded
customer_reviews.text: Cute, although the red lines are a little faded out. This may just be the design, but I think it makes it look a little washed/used. I do like the oversized aspect of them.
customer_reviews.author: Proper Bostonian

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These kitchen towels are the perfect size and absorbency. They wash nicely with little or no shrinkage. They are a great price for the quality of the towel.

customer_reviews.title: Absorbant!
customer_reviews.text: So nice to have a towel that actually dries dishes!
customer_reviews.author: J  Wilks

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I wanted. Thick, durable, woven dish towels. No lint, wash well, large size. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kara J. Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Needed some new towels for my kitchen and so far these have been great. Will update if that changes but as of now 5/5 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: That being said I love the vibrant color which lasts
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a while now, and they snag. That being said I love the vibrant color which lasts, and they do work very well.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for Towel to Apron conversion.
customer_reviews.text: I used these to make a tea-towel aprons and they worked beautifully.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absorbent dishtowels -- and after laundering there was hardly any shrinkage in dryer.

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen towels
customer_reviews.text: Great kitchen towels. Ours were getting old and we only had a few that worked well. Ordered a couple packs of these towels from Amazon. Towels work great and now we have several so we can keep them on rotation.

customer_reviews.title: Does not absorb
customer_reviews.text: Good quality it seems. Just does not absorb water at all.

customer_reviews.text: Love the size and qualtiy of these towels....red/white goe great in my kitchen... Sturdy towels, should last a good while...

customer_reviews.title: The towels are nice, absorbent and extra large
customer_reviews.text: The towels are nice, absorbent and extra large. The do come out of the dryer a little curled on the ends but once you fold them, they're fine.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great dish towels. Not one of those wimpy little halfsize towels this one is lovely.

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong buying these!
customer_reviews.text: These are great towels. Love the oversize plus so absorbent. The price was right for such quality. I plan to buy more.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and large, plus they launder well and are very absorbent.

customer_reviews.title: I can't say enough about these beautiful oversized kitchen towels
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about these beautiful oversized kitchen towels. They wash up perfectly, with little to no wrinkling. Super absorbent, and they are beautiful to boot. Buy them!

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen towels
customer_reviews.text: Good towel. Absorbs and looks nice while doing it. They are over-sized which is nice for kitchen use. Red is the accent color in my kitchen and these add a nice touch!

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Great towels. I love the large size for my bread baking. Will order again when needed.

customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. I like the lager size, works much better in the kitchen. I recommend these towels.

customer_reviews.title: Great Towels
customer_reviews.text: I love these towels! The wash well and are very absorbent! Great colors. Nice thickness and weight. I will be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Young

customer_reviews.title: Very good towel
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Ordered after I saw them reviews on America's Test Kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: HylasNY

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Gets softer with each wash and holds color after bleaching.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved these towels. Very sturdy and affordable. Received in a short period of time.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed, ineffective on dishes especially glasses
customer_reviews.text: Not absorbent at all. Very disappointed, ineffective on dishes especially glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hockert

customer_reviews.title: Pleased at first until washing a few times.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice large kitchen towels, ordered two sets. However, both sets fell apart in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne E

customer_reviews.title: noodles
customer_reviews.text: Have used the kitchen towels for two weeks. Each time I wash them they look like new. Love the large size, fun strips. An excellent purchase. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Noodles

customer_reviews.title: Rumpled and Unravelling
customer_reviews.text: I've just purchased these, hoping to replace my Harringdons' kitchen towels. The texture is rough, and rumpled coming fresh out of the dryer. After a single wash, straight out of the package, one towel is already unravelling from the center. Amazon Choice products are usually pretty good. Not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Eversz

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: My dish towels were old and torn and I obsessively searched for good replacements. Although these are a thicker weave than I normally buy, they are wonderfully absorbent and large. The edges don’t crimp too much in the dryer. I had no color bleeding as reported in some other reviews. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: chessie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful towels of a great size.
customer_reviews.text: I like that these towels are lang enough to hold a dish with one end while drying it with the other, and that they do not have lint. I cannot attest to the durability because I have had them only a short time, one towel has been washed and dried twice and still looks new. I do recommend these towels to anyone who values a good dish towel.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dews

customer_reviews.title: Better than Williams Sonoma, IMHO.
customer_reviews.text: I never thought that any towels, let alone a “no name” brand, would ever be as good as the Williams Sonoma towels that I remember from long ago. But these have far surpassed my expectations. They are soft, nicely woven, and comfortable to the touch, but aggressive enough for a serious drying. I haven’t had them long but I hope they will last.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Colgate

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: There absorbent. They look great. While I haven’t washed them alot one wash and towel still looks great. Glad I bought these to help celebrate my new free standing range
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: These are really lovely, durable towels! They definitely add class to the kitchen. Low lint and absorbent at a much better price point than other towels that are essentially the same. I'll likely purchase another set.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Q. Public

customer_reviews.title: cute!  good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I like these quite a bit. Extra large and they didn't shrink that I noticed when I washed them. (Granted I didn't measure them before and after, but I didn't notice a difference). I have a rustic theme in my home and bought these for show. I keep them rolled up in a tin pail in the kitchen. The white is a true crisp white even after washing and the red is just a nice classic red. I just bought a second set since I didn't order enough for the pail.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa G.

customer_reviews.title: What are you waiting for? Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: Love them even more than .y original William's Sonoma kitchen towels!! They are absorbent, thick, large, beautiful, available in several colors, at an excellent price, and very washable
customer_reviews.author: NoName

customer_reviews.title: BIG and thick
customer_reviews.text: I love how big these kitchen towels are. I ordered a different colored set for my mom because I loved them so much.
customer_reviews.author: P&T

customer_reviews.title: High quality kitchen towels
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of these towels and once again I am impressed with the high quality. They’re a lot better than the other kitchen towels of similar style. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly W.

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty....solid towel.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't want the flimsy cloth napkin towels, didn't want microfiber that soaks up nothing, & didn't want the crummy cheap-o towels that fall apart in a month. Was looking for a heartier dish/kitchen towel, found it. These are nice & great price.
customer_reviews.author: MOB

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to Williams Sonoma!
customer_reviews.text: If you are purchasing these towels you m a y be looking to save a few bucks on shipping (William Sonoma) who has great sale prices on their adorable towels yet they gouge you on shipping. Enter these comparably made alternatives - they look good, they wash well, they actually dry the dishes. THAT is a trifecta folks. I will be purchasing these again in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: P. Reece

customer_reviews.title: Strong and better than Williams Sonoma.
customer_reviews.text: Big and strong! Will be buying more. Same quality as high end stores with same product. Bought to replace one I think were bought at Willams Sonoma. Same towel but these are stronger. Totally worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie S.

customer_reviews.title: IF YOU WANT A KITCHEN SHOW TOWEL, THESE ARE GREAT
customer_reviews.text: IM GIVING TWO STARS BECAUSE THEY ARE PRETTY FOR SHOW TOWELS FOR THE KITCHEN, THEY DON'T ABSORB AN ONCE OF WATER, BAD PURCHASE
customer_reviews.author: Maria  IN N.Y.

customer_reviews.title: You'll never want a different kitchen towel
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for about a year and they still look brand new. I'm rough on kitchen towels, wiping up all manner of messes on the counter. These wash up well, no staining. I will get more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Living in the sticks

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if they are exact but seem like it. Anyway
customer_reviews.text: I bought these back in NC at Williams Sonoma. Not sure if they are exact but seem like it. Anyway, I LOVE them!!!

customer_reviews.title: Love the size of these
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of these. Wear it over my shoulder. It is always there when I need it in the kitchen.

customer_reviews.title: Great dish towels
customer_reviews.text: These towels are soft and thick, they're larger than most dishtowels, and they don't wrinkle. They're the best dishtowels I've ever had. I bought 2 packs and I'm glad I did. They were delivered within 2 days and I would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Great Towels
customer_reviews.text: I have used these towels for nearly a year now and they are the only kitchen I will use again. I was so impressed with the way they came out of the wash (heavy duty with bleach cycle) I gave a set to each of my sisters for Christmas last year. Durable, maintain shape and well priced.

customer_reviews.title: very nice towels; extra large size which I like
customer_reviews.text: very, very nice towels; extra large size which I like.

customer_reviews.title: These towels are really big and sturdy. My problem is
customer_reviews.text: These towels are really big and sturdy. My problem is, I always bleach my dishtowels and the red on these turned to a horrible pinky orange diluted blood color. Yuck.!

product_meta.title: COTTON CRAFT - 4 Pack - Basket Weave Kitchen Towels - Red - 100% Cotton - Oversized 20x30 - Modern Clean Striped Pattern - Convenient Hanging Loop
product_meta.description: Size:4 - Pack 20x30 Inches| Color:RedOur quality Basket Weave Striped Kitchen towels are designed sturdy and durable for long use. They are low lint with a hanging loop for easy storing. Use them, abuse them, throw them in the washer and repeat. Great Value!
feature_bullets: VALUE PACK: Each set contains four - Red striped basket weave cotton kitchen towels
DIMENSIONS: Kitchen towel measures 20 inches wide x 30 inches long
UTILITY: Easy storing. Each kitchen towel features a convenient loop for hanging .
HIGH QUALITY: Durable, Low Lint 100% Pure Cotton tightly woven Basket Weave design

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars262 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
